basics.name: Sergii Kucherenko
basics.label: full-stack developer
basics.summary: 21-year-old full-stack developer (C#, JS, TS). Experienced in building applications using .NET and ASP.NET Core frameworks, covering layered architecture, authentication, ORMs, SQL/NoSQL databases, caching, concurrency handling, real-time updates, unit testing, and Docker-based containerization. I am passionate about creating clean, efficient solutions and exploring how technologies work under the hood. A quick learner, focused on using modern programming concepts and best practices to build scalable, maintainable, and optimized systems. I enjoy transparent communication and tackling new challenges.

education.institution: National Technical University of Ukraine "Igor Sikorsky Kyiv Polytechnic Institute"
education.area: Software Engineering, Faculty of Applied Mathematics

projects.name: ETL CLI test tool
projects.summary: ETL CLI test tool with data preprocessing and bulk import from csv to MS SQL database.
highlights: Implemented streamed, type-agnostic CSV import handling large files efficiently
Designed data preprocessing pipeline for cleaning, transforming datasets with optimized memory usage and bulk insertions
Developed database schema with computed columns and performance-focused indexes
Tech stack: .NET console application, CommandLine, MS SQL
Tools: DI container, Git, Docker, CsvHelper, FastMember

projects.name: Obsidian codebase
projects.summary: Personal codebase for Obsidian vault with custom scripts, utilities, and integrations.
highlights: Designed command-like syntax and a custom date expression parser;
Implemented enhancements and optimizations to the caching system and entity managers;
Obsidian development: Obsidian, CustomJS, QuickAdd, Dataview.
Web technologies: HTML, CSS, DOM, JavaScript.

work.name: MeetPoint
work.summary: Web application to simplify meetup organizing by calculating optimal locations for multiple users.
highlights: Architected a clean monolithic system from the ground up, aligned with modern best practices;
Implemented core functionality and contributed to establishing team coding standards;
Set up database schemas, ensuring optimization and maintenance, implemented JWT-based authorization and SignalR sessions;
Initialized and maintained project infrastructure;
Actively participated in planning, code reviews, and team communications.
Backend: ASP.NET Web API (REST), ASP.NET Core Identity, Google Maps Platform, xUnit, Moq, Swagger
Databases: EF Core, PostgreSQL, Redis.
Frontend: Angular (v20), Angular Material (v3), RxJS, Google Maps Platform.
Infrastructure: Git, Docker

work.name: Rewriter
work.summary: Long-running Windows background service for automatic file conversion to PDF.
highlights: Was responsible for designing the service architecture and structure;
Worked closely with the Configuration API and implemented validation workflow;
Participated in testing and maintenance processes;
Backend: .NET Core, Worker Service, Configuration API
Infrastructure and tools: FluentValidation, Microsoft Office Interop API, Windows Service Control Manager, Git
